actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-50.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 286 - 127 (Record Vote No: 62).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the Joint Resolution (H.J.Res. 239) to approve the obligation of funds available under Public Law 98-473 for supporting military or paramilitary operations in Nicaragua.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 239 (military activities in Nicaragua).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the Joint Resolution (H.J.Res. 239) to approve the obligation of funds available under Public Law 98-473 for supporting military or paramilitary operations in Nicaragua.
